title: Bulbu Vaangittaen Machan Lyrics Sakalakala Vallavan Appatakkar Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Bulbu Vaangittaen Machan
Singer(s): Deva, ActorVivek & Jeyam Ravi
Movie: Sakalakala Vallavan Appatakkar 

Ungokka makka

Bulb Vaangitaen machan bulb vaangitaen
Naa gapla dhan thedi poi aapu vaangitaen
Bejaraayiten mamu Bejaraayiten 
avala kattunadhil kizhinju pona nijaar aagiten

Paavi kattum podhu metti potten da

Paambu tholula dhan sattai potten da
pattadhellam podhumada pondattiye thevai illa
